title: Mountaintop View 12 - 10 - 24 Heisman race , Coach / Player movement , Players of Week
body_text:
The celebration in Boise continues and with the first-round bye, even more attention is on the Heisman Trophy race featuring Bronco star Ashton Jeanty. We also have content surrounding coaching and player movement within the conference and end with basketball player of the week honors from both the men’s and women’s sides. Enjoy!!
Mountaintop View 12-10-24 Heisman race, Coach/Player movement, Players of Week
The Official Heisman Candidates announcement to no one’s surprise
Never has an Heisman Trophy race had such a social media presence, but this year’s race between Boise State’s Ashton Jeanty and Colorado’s Travis Hunter has certainly seen much debate online as to what is important. Our friends at Pro Football Focus give us their take on each player’s qualifications.
In two years, Barry Odom set a high bar at UNLV by transforming the football program into a national ranking and two trips to the conference championship game. With him leaving for Purdue, who are the early potential candidates for the Rebel top spot?
An opening in the San Diego State football coaching staff arose Sunday night when it was announced that Eric Schmidt would leave as Aztec defensive coordinator to be the head coach at the University of North Dakota. However, the best candidate for this opening might already be on the staff.
An 0-4 start ended in a 5-3 finish and the hopeful start of a football resurgence for the New Mexico Lobo football program. However, after the head coach announced his leaving followed by a slew of players going into the transfer portal, where does New Mexico go from here?
This Week’s MW MBB Players of the Week
And the honorees on the Women’s side…
Much like the Jeffersons, Aztecs movin’ on up in AP Top 25 MBB Poll
